engine we bring those two things together a deployment time to make decisions so in this case there's
actually two options that would satisfy this requirement I could either deploy this into a WS or I could deploy it into
one of cscs private cloud environments but if there was are there business rules in place like
if I was deploying this into development it would just automatically deploy into AWS and so that's really the power of

a system of policy engine capable of allowing you to define and enforce those policies at all of the different levels
and then obviously most organizations are hierarchical and so you need to be able to set policies at the root or
